page.description: Returns TRUE if field has loaded rules.
page.discussion: The .HAS_RULES() method returns TRUE (.T.) if the field has loaded rules; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE).
page.example: dim ptr as P dim tptr as P dim fptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.show() tptr = Table.current() fptr = tptr.field_get(1) ? fptr.has_rules() = .T. fptr = tptr.field_get(2) ? fptr.has_rules() = .F.
